title: Those Damn Vegans, Music Challenge, MTH, Marriage and more.
itunes:title: Those Damn Vegans, Music Challenge, MTH, Marriage and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Pick your role and come to The Steve Harvey Morning Show. Happy Friday. Here are the things you will hear a vegan say at the BBQ. What types of things does one learn being married to a toxic one? Fool #2 murders an original just for the fellas who are subject to too many questions. The fellas had their hands full in Comedy Roulette with a certain topic. The crew plays name that tune with Big Dog. Carla has something to say about the discrepancy between the genders around a specific subject. See what happens when you bring the wrong thing to a BBQ! Today in Closing Remarks, Steve brings to our attention the magic of thinking big. "Go big or go home!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
